verses.verse: Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%>, be <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> thou hast <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1223>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>, the <S%G5023>same<s%> <S%G3908>commit<s%> thou to <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> able <S%G2425>to<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.
4771, 3767 Suffer <S%G2553>hardship<s%> with <S%G5613>me<s%>, as a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

No <S%G3762>soldier<s%> on <S%G4754>service<s%> entangleth <S%G1707>himself<s%> in the affairs <S%G4230>of<s%> this <S%G979>life<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G700>please<s%> him who enrolled him as a <S%G4758>soldier<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> contend in the <S%G118>games<s%>, he <S%G4737>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%>, <S%G3362>except<s%> he have <S%G118>contended<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully<s%>.
The <S%G1092>husbandmen<s%> that <S%G2872>laboreth<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3335>be<s%> the <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G3335>partake<s%> of the <S%G4413>fruits<s%>.

Consider <S%G3539><s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G4907>understanding<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

Remember3421, 1453 <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%>:

wherein3739, 1722 I suffer <S%G2553>hardship<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2557>malefactor<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1210>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> I <S%G5278>endure<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G1588>elect<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5177>may<s%> <S%G5177>obtain<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G5124>glory<s%>.
Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is the <S%G3056>saying<s%>: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we died <S%G4880>with<s%> <S%G4800>him<s%>, we shall <S%G2532>also<s%> live with <S%G4800>him<s%>:

if <S%G1487><s%> we <S%G5278>endure<s%>, we <S%G4821>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> reign <S%G4821>with<s%> <S%G1487>him<s%>: if we shall <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G2548>him<s%>, he also will <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>:
if <S%G1487><s%> we are <S%G569>faithless<s%>, <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%>; for <S%G1410>he<s%> <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>.

Of these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G5279>put<s%> them in <S%G5279>remembrance<s%>, <S%G1263>charging<s%> them in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, that they <S%G3054>strive<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> about <S%G3054>words<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G5539>profit<s%>, <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2692>subverting<s%> of them that <S%G191>hear<s%>.

Give <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, a <S%G2040>workman<s%> that needeth not to be <S%G422>ashamed<s%>, handling <S%G3718>aright<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4026>shun<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> <S%G2757>babblings<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they will <S%G4298>proceed<s%> <S%G4119>further<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2192>will<s%> <S%G3542>eat<s%> as <S%G5613>doth<s%> a <S%G1044>gangrene<s%>: of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5211>Hymenaeus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5372>Philetus<s%>;

men <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> have <S%G795>erred<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1096>that<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> is <S%G1096>past<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G396>overthrow<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%>.

Howbeit <S%G3305><s%> the <S%G4731>firm<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> them that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G846>his<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G868>Let<s%> every <S%G3956>one<s%> that <S%G3687>nameth<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G5547>Lord<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G3585>wood<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3749>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G819>dishonor<s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1571>purge<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%>, he shall <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%>, <S%G37>sanctified<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2173>meet<s%> for the <S%G1203>master<s%>'s <S%G2173>use<s%>, <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G3512>youthful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> after <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> them that <S%G1941>call<s%> on the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3474>foolish<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G521>ignorant<s%> <S%G2214>questionings<s%> <S%G3868>refuse<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1080>gender<s%> <S%G3163>strifes<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>'s <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3164>strive<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2261>gentle<s%> <S%G4314>towards<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, apt to <S%G1317>teach<s%>, <S%G420>forbearing<s%>,

in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G3811>correcting<s%> them that oppose <S%G475>themselves<s%>; <S%G3379>if<s%> <S%G3379>peradventure<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> they may recover <S%G366>themselves<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, having been taken <S%G2221>captive<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1565>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>.
